sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart class="chart" :option="option" autoresize />
</template>

<script setup>
import { use } from 'echarts/core';
import { CanvasRenderer } from 'echarts/renderers';
import { PieChart } from 'echarts/charts';
import {
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent,
} from 'echarts/components';
import VChart, { THEME_KEY } from 'vue-echarts';
import { ref, provide } from 'vue';

use([
  CanvasRenderer,
  PieChart,
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent,
]);

const option = ref({
  color: ['#45C2E0', '#C1EBDD', '#FFC851'],
  tooltip: {
    trigger: 'item',
  },
  legend: {
    textStyle: {
      show: true,
      color: '#000',
      fontSize: 10
    }
  },
  series: [
    {
      label: {
        color: '#000',
        fontSize: 10
      },
      type: 'pie',
      radius: '40%',
      data: [
        { value: null, name: '滞留量' },
        { value: null, name: '流入量' },
        { value: null, name: '流出量' },
      ],
      emphasis: {
        itemStyle: {
          shadowBlur: 10,
          shadowOffsetX: 0,
          shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
        }
      }
    }
  ]
});
</script>
